### Farm Distribution
```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
Data = read.csv("Data_allParcels_new.csv", header=TRUE, sep=";")
IDParcel <- Data[1]

############################################################################################################################
#First random allocation run
############################# Input

#List of parcels for each farm and grassland category (MI=intensive meadow; PI=intensive pasture; ME=extensive meadow; PE=extensive pasture)  
OID_MI<-as.list(rep(NA,10))  
OID_PI<-as.list(rep(NA,10))
OID_ME<-as.list(rep(NA,10))
OID_PE<-as.list(rep(NA,10))

MI<-rep(0,10)
PI<-rep(0,10)
ME<-rep(0,10)
PE<-rep(0,10)

############################# Random allocation of parcels

#Share of grasland per grassland category smi=share intensive meadows; spi=share of intensive pastures; sme=share of extensive meadows; remaining parcels are allocated to the share of extensive pastures 

sme<-0.04
spe<-0.01
spi<-0.38
smi<-0.57

#do the following loop for each farm (k); municipality (m) or region (r)

for (farm in unique(Data$k)){
  
  ##############sample randomly one parcel until the share of extensive meadows is equal to or bigger than the predefined share (sme)   
  
  while (ME[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]<=(sme*Data$shareGras[which(Data$k==farm)[1]])) {
    
    #parcels can only be sampled once (not already be part of OID_ME);  
    tempME <- Data[which(Data$k==farm & Data$OID%ni%OID_ME[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]),"OID"]
    #sample only if there are remaining parcels on the farm -> otherwise 0          
    if(length(tempME)!=1){
      temp<-sample(tempME,1)}else{
        temp<-tempME}
    OID_ME[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]<-c(OID_ME[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]],temp)
    #share of intensive meadows for each farm
    ME[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]<-sum(Data[which(Data$k==farm & Data$OID%in%OID_ME[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]),"Percent_area"])
  }

  ##############sample randomly one parcel until the share of extensive pasture is equal to or bigger than the predefined share (spe) 
  
  while (PE[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]<=(spe*Data$shareGras[which(Data$k==farm)[1]])) {
    tempPE <- Data[which(Data$k==farm & Data$OID%ni%OID_ME[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]
                                              & Data$OID%ni%OID_PE[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]),"OID"]
    if(length(tempPE)!=1){
      temp<-sample(tempPE,1)}else{
        temp<-tempPE}
    OID_PE[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]<-c(OID_PE[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]],temp)
    #share of intensive meadows for each farm
    PE[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]<-sum(Data[which(Data$k==farm & Data$OID%in%OID_PE[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]),"Percent_area"])
  }

  ##############sample randomly one parcel until the share of intensive pasture is equal to or bigger than the predefined share (spi) 
  
  while (PI[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]<=(spi*Data$shareGras[which(Data$k==farm)[1]])) {
    tempPI <- Data[which(Data$k==farm & Data$OID%ni%OID_ME[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]
                                              & Data$OID%ni%OID_PE[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]
                                              & Data$OID%ni%OID_PI[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]),"OID"]
    if(length(tempPI)!=1){
      temp<-sample(tempPI,1)}else{
        temp<-tempPI}
    OID_PI[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]<-c(OID_PI[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]],temp)
    #share of intensive meadows for each farm
    PI[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]<-sum(Data[which(Data$k==farm & Data$OID%in%OID_PI[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]),"Percent_area"])
  }

  ##############sample randomly one parcel until the share of intensive meadow is equal to or bigger than the predefined share (smi) 
  
  if(Data$shareGras[which(Data$k==farm)[1]]>0.8){
    #remaining parcels are allocated to intensive meadows
    OID_MI[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]<-Data[which(Data$k==farm & Data$OID%ni%OID_ME[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]
                                                                               & Data$OID%ni%OID_PE[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]
                                                                               & Data$OID%ni%OID_PI[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]
                                                                               & Data$OID%ni%OID_MI[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]),"OID"]
    
    MI[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]<-sum(Data[which(Data$k==farm   & Data$OID%in%OID_MI[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]),"Percent_area"])
    
  }else{    
    
    while (MI[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]<=(smi*Data$shareGras[which(Data$k==farm)[1]])) {
      tempMI <- Data[which(Data$k==farm & Data$OID%ni%OID_ME[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]
                                                & Data$OID%ni%OID_PE[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]
                                                & Data$OID%ni%OID_PI[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]
                                                & Data$OID%ni%OID_MI[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]),"OID"]
      
      #sample only if there are remaining parcels on the farm -> otherwise 0
      if(length(tempMI)!=1){
        temp<-sample(tempMI,1)}else{
          temp<-tempMI}
      OID_MI[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]<-c(OID_MI[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]],temp)
      
      #share of intensive meadows for each farm
      MI[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]<-sum(Data[which(Data$k==farm & Data$OID%in%OID_MI[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]),"Percent_area"])
    }  
  } 
}

############################# Clean and join samples to one column
OID_MI<-lapply(OID_MI, function(x) x[!is.na(x)])
OID_PI<-lapply(OID_PI, function(x) x[!is.na(x)])
OID_ME<-lapply(OID_ME, function(x) x[!is.na(x)])
OID_PE<-lapply(OID_PE, function(x) x[!is.na(x)])


names(OID_MI)<-unique(Data$k)
names(OID_PI)<-unique(Data$k)
names(OID_ME)<-unique(Data$k)
names(OID_PE)<-unique(Data$k)

OID_all<-list(OID_MI,OID_PI,OID_ME,OID_PE)

names(OID_all)<-c("MI","PI","ME","PE")



OID_all_df<-melt(OID_all,na.rm=FALSE)
colnames(OID_all_df)<-c("OID","Farm","Category_1")
OID_all_df<-join(IDParcel, OID_all_df, by = "OID", type = "left", match = "all")
colnames(OID_all_df)<-c("OID","Farm","Run_1")

OID_all_df$Farm <- NULL

############################################################################################################################

############################# 
#Loop to create variability
#############################

for (i in 2:99){
  
  #List of parcels for each farm and grassland category (MI=intensive meadow; PI=intensive pasture; ME=extensive meadow; PE=extensive pasture)  
  
  OID_MI<-as.list(rep(NA,10))  
  OID_PI<-as.list(rep(NA,10))
  OID_ME<-as.list(rep(NA,10))
  OID_PE<-as.list(rep(NA,10))
  
  
  #Parcels per grassland category for each farm 
  
  MI<-rep(0,10)
  PI<-rep(0,10)
  ME<-rep(0,10)
  PE<-rep(0,10)
  
  sme<-0.04
  spe<-0.01
  spi<-0.38
  smi<-0.57
  
  ############################# Random allocation of parcels
  #Share of grasland per grassland category smi=share intensive meadows; spi=share of intensive pastures; sme=share of extensive meadows; remaining parcels are allocated to the share of extensive pastures 
  
  #do the following loop for each farm (k); municipality (m) or region (r)  
  for (farm in unique(Data$k)){
    
    ##############sample randomly one parcel until the share of extensive meadows is equal to or bigger than the predefined share (sme)  
    
    while (ME[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]<=(sme*Data$shareGras[which(Data$k==farm)[1]])) {
      #parcels can only be sampled once (not already be part of OID_ME);  
      tempME <- Data[which(Data$k==farm & Data$OID%ni%OID_ME[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]),"OID"]
      
      #sample only if there are remaining parcels on the farm -> otherwise 0          
      if(length(tempME)!=1){
        temp<-sample(tempME,1)}else{
          temp<-tempME}
      OID_ME[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]<-c(OID_ME[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]],temp)
      
      #share of extensive meadows for each farm
      ME[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]<-sum(Data[which(Data$k==farm & Data$OID%in%OID_ME[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]),"Percent_area"])
    }
    
    #sample randomly one parcel until the share of extensive pasture is equal to or bigger than the predefined share (spe)
    
    while (PE[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]<=(spe*Data$shareGras[which(Data$k==farm)[1]])) {
      tempPE <- Data[which(Data$k==farm & Data$OID%ni%OID_ME[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]
                                                & Data$OID%ni%OID_PE[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]),"OID"]
      
      ##############sample only if there are remaining parcels on the farm -> otherwise 0 
      if(length(tempPE)!=1){
        temp<-sample(tempPE,1)}else{
          temp<-tempPE}
      OID_PE[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]<-c(OID_PE[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]],temp)
      
      #share of extensive pastures for each farm
      PE[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]<-sum(Data[which(Data$k==farm & Data$OID%in%OID_PE[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]),"Percent_area"])
    }
    
    ##############sample randomly one parcel until the share of intensive pasture is equal to or bigger than the predefined share (spi)
    
    while (PI[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]<=(spi*Data$shareGras[which(Data$k==farm)[1]])) {
      tempPI <- Data[which(Data$k==farm & Data$OID%ni%OID_ME[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]
                                                & Data$OID%ni%OID_PE[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]
                                                & Data$OID%ni%OID_PI[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]),"OID"]
      
      #sample only if there are remaining parcels on the farm -> otherwise 0
      if(length(tempPI)!=1){
        temp<-sample(tempPI,1)}else{
          temp<-tempPI}
      OID_PI[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]<-c(OID_PI[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]],temp)
      
      #share of intensive pastures for each farm
      PI[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]<-sum(Data[which(Data$k==farm & Data$OID%in%OID_PI[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]),"Percent_area"])
    }
    
    
    ##############sample randomly one parcel until the share of intensive meadow is equal to or bigger than the predefined share (smi)
    
    if(Data$shareGras[which(Data$k==farm)[1]]>0.8){
      #remaining parcels are allocated to intensive meadows
      OID_MI[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]<-Data[which(Data$k==farm & Data$OID%ni%OID_ME[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]
                                                                                 & Data$OID%ni%OID_PE[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]
                                                                                 & Data$OID%ni%OID_PI[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]
                                                                                 & Data$OID%ni%OID_MI[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]),"OID"]
      
      MI[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]<-sum(Data[which(Data$k==farm   & Data$OID%in%OID_MI[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]),"Percent_area"])
      
    }else{    
      
      while (MI[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]<=(smi*Data$shareGras[which(Data$k==farm)[1]])) {
        tempMI <- Data[which(Data$k==farm & Data$OID%ni%OID_ME[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]
                                                  & Data$OID%ni%OID_PE[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]
                                                  & Data$OID%ni%OID_PI[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]
                                                  & Data$OID%ni%OID_MI[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]),"OID"]
        
        #sample only if there are remaining parcels on the farm -> otherwise 0
        if(length(tempMI)!=1){
          temp<-sample(tempMI,1)}else{
            temp<-tempMI}
        OID_MI[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]<-c(OID_MI[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]],temp)
        
        #share of intensive meadows for each farm
        MI[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]<-sum(Data[which(Data$k==farm & Data$OID%in%OID_MI[[which(unique(Data$k)==farm)]]),"Percent_area"])
      }  
    } 
  }
  
  ############################# Clean and join samples to one column 
  
  names(OID_MI)<-unique(Data$k)
  names(OID_PI)<-unique(Data$k)
  names(OID_ME)<-unique(Data$k)
  names(OID_PE)<-unique(Data$k)
  
  OID_all<-list(OID_MI,OID_PI,OID_ME,OID_PE)
  
  names(OID_all)<-c("MI","PI","ME","PE")
  
  
  ############################# Add temporary allocation to OID_all Dataframe 
  OID_all_df_temp<-melt(OID_all)
  colnames(OID_all_df_temp)<-c("OID","Farm",paste("Run_",i,sep=""))
  OID_all_df_temp$Farm <- NULL
  
  OID_all_df<- join(OID_all_df,OID_all_df_temp)
}


write.table(OID_all_df, "Farm_p_5.csv", sep=";")
```

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# Model for NEE
C <- read_excel("CO2.xlsx") # Read the file with the Fluxnet observations
C2<-C[-c(22,25,27,41,63,66),]
reg.C<-lm(C~Regime+Elevation*Intensity, data=C2) # Final model


######################################################################
# Predict C flux for each parcel based on grassland category in Run 1
Intensity_1 <-substr(P$Run_1, 2, 2)
levels(Intensity_1)<- c("", "Extensive", "Intensive")
Regime_1 <-substr(P$Run_1, 1, 1)
Yield_t<-cbind(Yield_t, Intensity_1,Regime_1)
levels(Yield_t$Regime_1)<- c("", "Meadow", "Pasture")

Yield_t$Intensity<-Yield_t$Intensity_1
levels(Yield_t$Intensity)<- c("Extensive", "Extensive", "Intensive")
Yield_t$Regime<-Yield_t$Regime_1
levels(Yield_t$Regime)<- c("Meadow", "Meadow", "Pasture")

predC_1<-Yield_t$OID
predC_1<-predict(reg.C, newdata=Yield_t)
for(i in 1:nrow(Yield_t)){
  if((Yield_t$Run_1[i]=="0")){predC_1[i]=0}
}


## Estimation of the amount of C in fertilizer and of the amount of C exported used based on the yields
Fert_1<-Yield_t$OID
Harv_1<-Yield_t$OID
for(i in 1:nrow(Yield_t)){
  if(Yield_t$Intensity_1[i]=="I") {(Fert_1[i]=0.012*Yield_t$Yield_1[i]*6.1)} else {Fert_1[i]=0}
}
for(i in 1:nrow(Yield_t)){
  if(Yield_t$Regime_1[i]=="Meadow") {Harv_1[i]=0.47*Yield_t$Yield_1[i]} 
  if(Yield_t$Regime_1[i]=="Pasture") {Harv_1[i]=(-0.01+0.41*Yield_t$Yield_1[i])}
  if(Yield_t$Regime_1[i]=="") {Harv_1[i]=0}
}

## Calculation of C sequestration for each field
Cseq_1<-(-predC_1+Fert_1-Harv_1)
value_C_1<-sum (Cseq_1) # Total C sequestration in Run 1
```
